entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
